ej,nortj101,P,runge901,Fighting ej,kraul102,P,runge901,Fighting ej,odomj101,P,runge901,Fighting $Jim Northrup struck on the back of the helmet by the Jack Aker pitch; Northrup, stunned, charged the mound and the two exchanged punches; both benches cleared; many Tigers went after Aker, who suffered five spike wounds on his right leg, a swollen lip, a cut forehead and a black eye; a fan threw a beer cup at a Tigers player, who threw a baseball into the stands; it struck a woman who suffered a broken cheek; Northrup, Blue Moon Odom and Lew Krausse ejected by HP umpire Ed Runge; Northrup taked to the hospital
$first run in 26 innings off Athletics pitchers
